papers.title: Your Ideas are Worthless
authors: As the owner of an open source hardware company
I frequently encounter people who tell me why my business cannot possibly succeed. After six years of continuous growth
I would like to share my thoughts about why those people are wrong and how the mythology of invention affects perception. I'll share lessons from my background as a hacker
and business owner and discuss the past
